code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export var registration=function registration(_ref){var email=_ref.email,password=_ref.password;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json',"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkResponse);};export var authorization=function authorization(_ref2){var email=_ref2.email,password=_ref2.password;return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json',"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(checkResponse);};export var getContent=function getContent(token){return fetch(BASE_URL+'/users/me',{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json',"Content-Type":"application/json","Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(checkResponse);};export var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430 ".concat(res.status));};
